name: Defend the planet
description:
In "Defend the planet" you are the pilot of a Spaceship that rotates around a planet and can shoot. The objetive is to kill all enemies and don't let them get to the planet.
There are different types of enemies and a lot of "buffs" trough the gameplay.

What to expect:

-Different types of enemies.

-Destructible shot improvements during gameplay.

-Destructive defend improvements during gameplay.

-Cool minimalist style.

-Funny, simple and relaxing gameplay.

How to play:

-Arrow keys to move the spaceship

-Space to shoot (Each press of Space is a rocket)
